alert.note: Alert for Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 8:47PM EST until January 08 at 5:48PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohoopee River near Reidsville. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, water enters the back yards of some homes in the Joy Bluff community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 800 PM EST Friday, the stage was 11.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EST Friday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 7.4 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.8 feet on 02/02/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
